product_name: UCO Candle Lantern Beeswax Candles - Package of 3
long_description: These replacement, dripless candles are made from natural beeswax, offering a long burn time, pleasant aroma and less smoke. New formulation of 100% beeswax around a pure cotton wick offers a 12-15 hour burn time-- depending on actual burn conditions. Natural beeswax produces less smoke and a pleasing scent while also producing negative ions that actually help clarify the air.
short_description: These replacement, dripless candles are made from natural beeswax, offering a long burn time, pleasant aroma and less smoke.
